Request IDs are provided by backend and must be unique.","kind":"dev","methods":{"cancelRequest(bytes32)":{"params":{"requestId":"id to cancel"}},"fulfillVerification(bytes32,bool)":{"params":{"requestId":"request id to fulfill","success":"verification result"}},"requestVerification(bytes32,bytes32,uint64)":{"params":{"expirySeconds":"How many seconds from now the request stays valid (e.g., 60)","requestId":"Unique id for this request (must not be reused)","userId":"Opaque user ID (e.g., keccak256(userAddress) or app-specific id)"}}},"stateVariables":{"oracleAllowlist":{"details":"oracle addr => allowed"},"requests":{"details":"requestId => Request"}},"title":"Onchain Pull Verifier (multi-oracle, expiry, allowlist)","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"cancelRequest(bytes32)":{"notice":"Requester cancels a pending request (e.g., timeout or user aborted)"},"fulfillVerification(bytes32,bool)":{"notice":"Oracle fulfills a pending verification. Off-chain oracle(s) observe VerificationRequested events,         perform verification off-chain using encrypted seeds, and call back on-chain to fulfill results.","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/Verifier.sol":"Verifier"},"evmVersion":"prague","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/"]},"sources":{"src/Verifier.sol":{"keccak256":"0xa25f8ac6130cc6265fb7e2366f9c02069f0c83a261b983a225e682dccf96b2ce","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://537e851853c4d905b7b44a6bc31facc2cf5a137a66a97919bb7708d9266797b3","dweb:/ipfs/QmSYCVETRsawg9P3nUZCseejTER6hCotkNmtP8LHQa14Xy"]}},"version":1}

params.expirySeconds: How many seconds from now the request stays valid (e.g., 60)
params.requestId: Unique id for this request (must not be reused)
params.userId: Opaque user ID (e.g., keccak256(userAddress) or app-specific id)

cancelRequest(bytes32).notice: Requester cancels a pending request (e.g., timeout or user aborted)

fulfillVerification(bytes32,bool).notice: Oracle fulfills a pending verification. Only callable by allowlisted oracle.

requestVerification(bytes32,bytes32,uint.notice: Submit a verification request. Emits VerificationRequested event that oracle listens for.
